content: That makes sense. I didn't think about the arrabbiata sauce clashing with the Alfredo sauce. I'll definitely use a plain fettuccine for the Fettuccine Alfredo recipe. By the way, do you have any tips on how to store Parmigiano-Reggiano cheese to keep it fresh for a longer period? I've heard it's a bit delicate and can go bad quickly if not stored properly.
